title: Like a Prince
overview: Souleyman, 27, a boxing champion in full preparation for the Olympic Games with the French team, sees his future crumble when he cracks the bones of his hand, following a fight in a bar. Souleyman is excluded from the team and is sent to the Ch√¢teau de Chambord, where he must perform his 400 hours of community service (TIG) collecting waste in the gardens.
